rules_text:
When Hatewracked Explorer enters, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature. If you do, crystallize. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Treasure.)[/i]
{4}{B}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Destroy target creature if it was dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: [i]“I will erase myself, and let go of what I've done.”[/i]
